segments.text: What a disaster this kitchen is becoming, it truly vexes me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is not just running, it's overflowing completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is streaming down the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is steadily expanding, making the floor wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the children, completely unsupervised in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are helping themselves to cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable stool looks like it could tip at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene feels so messy and out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite put off by the disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cleanliness of the garden outside only highlights this internal chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of carelessness is really quite off-putting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand to see such a mess unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
